summary: blow a kiss to the sun
title: blow a kiss to the sun
body:
pairings: marcus flint/oliver wood

summary: it had been a year since oliver went to war, and marcus missed him more and more every day

note: it’s short but it’s one of my favourites of my own works, its been a hot minute!!

Oliver wasn’t a man of many words either, but he’d die for Marcus.

He was at war, after all, and Marcus wasn’t.

Marcus sat on his balcony, looking out at the coastline, looking out at the sunset, and took a deep drag of his cigarette.

He blew a kiss to the sun. The sun would take it to Oliver for him.

link

summary: Rec me long feel-good fics, please?
title: Rec me long feel-good fics, please?
body:
Ok, I’m sick at home. Can someone please rec me some long nice feel-good romantic fics?

Something where you know the baddies get vanquished, the goodies like each other, maybe even the holiest of holies, intact and likeable families? Long would be good.

blog.name: lina-kim-is-here
blog.title: but I will gladly join the fight

tags: hogwarts will always be there to welcome you home
body:
After the dust settled

After the dust settled they stared at what used to bet their home. Or that what was left of it anyway. It wasn’t much. The green and silver banners torn on the ground, the once shiny broom broken in the corner and the round table that had been the center of most of their nightly shenanigans buried underneath the rubble. It was a miracle that the magic that kept the lake outside hadn´t broken. The pale light that made it into the room was colder than usual. The once pristine water of the lake now muddy and gloomy. Every once in a while a white hand would bump against the invisible barrier that kept the water at bay and the students could only stare at the corpses with tired eyes. They didn’t cry. How could they? Crying was a sign of weakness.  Or was that not what their parents taught them from a very early age? Where were they now? Dead, or on their way to Azkaban. Or they were upstairs, outside on the grounds, desperatly searching for their children. Did it matter? Bloody hands carefully picked up some of the shattered picture frames. A snapshot from another lifetime, or so it seemed. Four sly grins and roguish smirks frozen in time. Two of them they wouldn’t see again. Ever. Trembling, they pulled the photo out of the frame. A little something to remember them by. It shouldn’t be left behind. A raspy meow echoed through the room. The cat looked like it had been waiting there for a while now. Its green eyes crusted with dried dust. They knew it. It was the cat of a third year. A girl with dark hair and kind eyes and a wicked laugh. She was upstairs with her parents. They had cradled her dead body after they had pulled it out of the rubble. Greyback’s marks all over it. 

There were words at the back of their throat that were to sharp to say. So all they did was crouch down and pull the dishelved creature into their arms. It went with it without any complains. They sat like that for quite some time. Staring into the nothingness of the lake. The sound of foodprints came and went. Some would linger for a while, accompanied by the rumbling of rubble being gingerly moved away. It wasn’t until the silvery glow of the moon, filtered through the clearing water, hit the ground that they stirred again. Nobody had come for the cat.

summary:
I agree so much with people who say Snape is the worst character; even though I like him a lot.
The way he bullied and...
body:
I agree so much with people who say Snape is the worst character; even though I like him a lot.

The way he bullied and mistreated the students is just not okay?? I don’t understand people trying to defend him like “oh but he was misunderstood and hurt” or some other excuse of the sort. No, I don’t care. No matter what you have been through in your life, that doesn’t give you a free pass to be an asshole; especially not to children who at that point, need the support and care a teacher should be giving. You don’t see Harry hurting, bullying, or tearing people down because he lost his family. I don’t give a fuck who you lost or who bullied you, or what was “taken from you”, taking it out on others is not okay, and nobody should ever be defending this.

Recently I have been doing a lot of digging into his character via tryna read the books (only on book 2, r.i.p my ability to read) and re-watch the movies, hoping there could be something I could find to defend and be like “he actually had a good reason for this” but honestly at the end of the day, he really is just a fucked up, greasy, bitter asshole of a character..

As I said, I like Snape a lot; but this guy is severely flawed, and there is absolutely no excuse for his shitty behaviour. Yes it is sad he died, and yeah he did protect Harry and do some okay things, but that really does not redeem him because he kept being a dick probably thinking that his good deeds would excuse the bad ones.

body:
ravenclaws at work

working hard on a project. getting distracted by details. the noise of the office and colleagues around you. the scent of coffee in the morning. drinking tea while typing. the sun rising around you. watching the day begin and people getting busy. witty comments and funny stories.

tags: Movie James Potter? I don't know that white boy
summary: Just wanted to say the way you draw james potter is amazing he's hot as fuck and i've been blessed thank u for this lovely view...
question: Just wanted to say the way you draw james potter is amazing he's hot as fuck and i've been blessed thank u for this lovely view 🙌🙌🙌 Hallelujah
answer:
Thank you I love this dude so much and he’s so fun to draw (THE MOVIE DID HIM NO JUSTICE)

One of my best friend’s @themostwonderfulbread sees my James Potter as canon so when they saw like normal James Potter they went into shock
